description.value: The Minion is addicted to something their master offers them, be it a Drug, Souls, Daemon Blood, etc. The Minion will sacrifice almost anything to satisfy this addiction and avoids dissapointing its pmaster. It can re-roll failed Loyalty Tests. However if their master cannot supply what the Minion Desires for more than 1d10 + Minion's WP Bonus Days, the minion suffers -10 to all Characteristics, with a cumulative -5 per day. If this goes on too long, the minion may abandon the character, succumb to madness, die, etc.
